data.title: Attribute GNU freefont in the credits.
data.body: Closes #6862.

data.title: DefaultCash property ignored if 5000 is selectable choice
data.body:
Example code:
    PlayerResources:
        SelectableCash: 2500, 5000, 7000, 10000
        DefaultCash: 7000
        AdviceInterval: 650

As long as 5000 is a choice in SelectableCash then 5000 will be used regardless of DefaultCash. If you remove the SelectableCash option of 5000 then it will use the correct DefaultCash.

EDIT: Also if the DefaultCash is not 5000 it gives an immediate chat notification that you have set the credits to DefaultCash, despite it being... default.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/6317348-defaultcash-property-ignored-if-5000-is-selectable-choice?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Recreate D2k Saboteur Power
data.body:
In Dune 2000 the Ordos Palace had a support power whereby it would charge up -> you click the icon -> it releases the Saboteur from the Palace.

This is also used for the Fremen power given to the Atreides so I suggest the following things should at least be editable:

-Type of units to create
-Building to spawn from
-Number of units to create
-Recharge time

Multiple copies of the building just speed up the recharge too, so this could be an option (whether to increase charge speed or provide multiple copies of the power).

data.title: Misleading sequence exception.
data.body:
``` yaml
gacnst:
    idle: ggcnst
        Start: 0
        ShadowStart: 3
        Offset: 0,-55,0
    make: ggcnstmk
        Start: 0
        Length: 28
        ShadowStart: 28
        Offset: 0,-55,0
    damaged-idle: ggcnst
        Start: 1
        ShadowStart: 4
        Offset: 0,-55,0
    idle-fans: ggcnst_a
        Start: 0
        Length: 6
        Tick: 150
        Offset: 0,-55,0
    damaged-idle-fans: ggcnst_a
        Start: 5
        Length: 6
        Tick: 150
        Offset: 0,-55,0
    crane-overlay: ggcnst_b
        Start: 0
        Length: 20
        Tick: 150
        Offset: 0,-55,0
    damaged-crane-overlay: ggcnst_b
        Start: 20
        Length: 20
        Tick: 150
        Offset: 0,-55,0
    icon: xxicon
        Start: 0
```

Throws with: `System.InvalidOperationException`: Unit `gacnst` does not have a sequence named `make`.

This should instead tell the user that the file `ggcnstmk` does not exist.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/6306380-misleading-sequence-exception?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Game engine Perfomace Improvments!
data.body:
Please document the game engine source code to easy the hacking of it and improvement of performance. 
 The game need and better 2d sprite rendering engine written in Mono/C# and better voxel rendering engine and voxel animation rendering. I suggest finding a way to integrate a third party open source 2d game engine. It must have open source flexible license and some years of development. Why not to integrate a physics engine like box 2d later.
 Also is needed to find a way to fasten the scripting engine LUA. You will fasten the AI and pathfiding algorithms. Also AI and pathfinding algorithms must be fastened by implementing better algorithms for calculations.  I suggest developers to study older algorithm implementations and then write them for the game engine.

data.title: Fix global git config in update-wiki.sh
data.body: Closes #6971

data.title: Add a readme file with the thirdparty dll sources.
data.body: Closes #6863.

data.title: update-wiki.sh should not be using `git config --global`
data.body: It was an unwelcome surprise after testing #6962 to find that my commits to non-openra repositories were being attributed to orabot.  It should be sufficient to set this locally after changing into the openra-wiki repo dir.

data.title: New idea :D for enemy spawn.......
data.body:
Sometimes you dont want to know who the enemy is spawning.
But you also dont want that he spawns very near to you.

so why not an range span option like 
a-c

so the enmy can span on a,b or c but you dont know.
and cant span on d,e or f :D

data.title: the neutral support airplane pushes all other aircrafts around RA1 bug
data.body: When someone has an helicopter or airplane in the air the neutral support airplane can push it around/away.

data.title: Fixed vqa crashes
data.body: Fixes #4224.

data.title: Easier Footprints.
data.body:
- Add FootprintType enum
- Add `char → FootprintType` dictionary
- Add `FootprintType → char` dictionary
- Add TilesOfType method to FootprintUtils
- Remove (now obsolete) UnpathableTiles
- Add Dictionary extension method to reverse KV pairs
  - Values → Keys
  - Keys → Values

data.title: Short Game option
data.body:
Adds a short game lobby and map option. 

The short game is basically what we already had, players need only destroy an enemy's base buildings to win. In a "long" game, they need to destroy (almost) all enemy units to win. The exception are cloaked units and buildings (that is, those that are cloaked by default, not upgraded ones), which are not taken into account.

Also fixes #6589.

data.title: Initial step towards reorganising namespace/folder structure of Mods.*
data.body: As follow-up of my comment on #6735, this is how I'd approach the reorganisation. Feedback is welcome, of course.

data.title: Wiki: keep separate Trait and Lua API docs for release and playtest
Found bug i think,the AI in RA has problems of stuck at the edge of the map...
data.body:
when you play an map an start at the buttom and you build 2 factorys at the edge of the map.
then the ore trucks get stuck there because one of them want in and one of them want out.

to fix this.

1.make 1 cell at the edge of every map un-build-able but the units can walk/drive over it.
2.Make the pathfinding so intelligent that the units know there is no other way and drive back to an place who is more space to drive around the other vehicle.

data.body: Adds a bit of polish to paradrops (and especially tank drops in my upcoming countries stuff)

data.title: Linux launcher syntax error.
data.body: Regression from #6888.  `&&` is invalid syntax inside a test statement (use `-a` instead), and causes the launcher script to abort with an error whenever the game terminates.  This also prevents the crash dialog from showing in all cases.

data.title: Silo's needed alert goes of way too often
data.body:
I don't know at which point the originals started nagging about building silo's, but I think that due the increased gameplay speed of openra, the "silo's needed" alert goes of way too often.

I did see some nice ideas from https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/3816 that wouldn't have the need for this alert, and changing the mechanic of the silo's completely. I can live with that.

data.title: An new Infantry for the Soviets his name is ??? sorry
data.body:
Simple Idea for RA 1
As an balance for this https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/6953

Owner: Soviets
Cost: $950

??? is the Soviet Secret Forces Unit. He carries a fast Granade Lancher which can fast take out light vehicle.
He has an special suit because its 

Pros and cons

Pros:
he is immune against Projectiles,Rockets,anti - person mine NOT anti - tank mines and Grenades. 
His gun is 20% faster than an Grenader the range hit i s the same as from the Grenader.
He has 2 more cell in fire range as the Grenader.
You can build as many as you want.

Cons:
He cost very much.
He is 15% slower than the Rifle Infantry.
Hits from Flame,Tesla or Tanks (not the light tank). Make 20% more damage than the other weapons do.
when he died he explode in an range damage around him about 9 cells.(not good to take him in an group)

data.title: An new  Infantry  for the Allies his name is ??? i dont know :/
data.body:
Simple Idea for RA 1
As an balance for this https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/6954

Owner: Allies
Cost: $1100

??? is the Allies Secret Forces Unit. He carries a very small variation of an M61 Vulcan  which can fast take out enemy infantry.
He has an special suit its an combination of an heat-resistant suit + Faraday cage

Pros and cons

Pros:
he is immune against Tesla tower,trooper and tanks.
Fire make only 10% of his normal damage.
His suit make him invisible to the radar that means the enemy cant see him on the map.
His gun is slower than the guns of Tanya but it has an range attack of 5 cells,in the middle it makes 70& damage and at the outside 30%

Cons:
He cost very much.
He is 10% slower than the Rifle Infantry.
Before he can shoot there is an load time of 1,5 sec before he is shooting.
Explosions from rockets,mines or granades. Make 40% more damage than the other weapons do.
You can only build one of him not more.

data.title: Water Mine Layer ... how it works and how to balance
data.body:
Simple Idea for RA 1

Owner: Allies, Soviets
Cost: $900 

A slow small ship used by both sides to lay Watermines. Allies and Soviets use it to lay anti-ship mines.
It is slow and has no weapons to directly combat enemy units.
He can ship 3 Mines maximum
and they cannot be seen and can only be resupplied by using the Sub Pen or Naval Yard.
Resupplying cost credits.
An Mine has an Range attack of 9 cells,stronger in the middle than at the border.

data.title: when you want to build some structures but there are Units from you.......
data.body:
Simple Idea for RA 1

You want to build an structure at some place and you are in a hurry.
so the standing some units from you in the way and you cant build over them.....
so here the idea:

when you click with the building on the place and some of the cells are blocked buy your units ,the units instantly walk 5 cells away from this place :D

data.title: Remove automated rpm and arch packaging.
data.body:
Closes #6480.

This depends on a forthcoming website pr that adjusts the download page.

data.title: Retire classic mouse orders
data.body: This feature has never worked properly, and is one of our most frequent support requests / complaints by non-technical players on IRC / comments.  Nobody has shown an interest in fixing and maintaining this feature, so it is time to remove it.
